comment: Measures are continuous from below: if ` E ` is a sequence of nondecreasing measurable sets (with bounded measure) then the measure of the union is the limit of the measures. This is the general case of Proposition 112C (e) of [Fremlin1] p. 16 . This theorem generalizes ~ meaiuninc and ~ meaiuninc2 where the sequence is required to be bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 13-Feb-2022.)
